title: Pixel 3 will not shutdown, constant reboot after Android 11 update
content:
After Android 11 update my Pixel 3 phone constantly is rebooting.
I performed a factory reset to no avail.
Phone will even reboot in Safe mode.
Phone reboots less if I turn off WiFi and leave in Airplane mode.

Uninstalled third party apps.
Disabled many standard apps.

Rebooting still happening.
